thread.title: Bigg Boss 9 October 19: Kishwer Merchant and Roopal Tyagi’s cat fight in episode 8 was super fun!
thread.title_full: Bigg Boss 9 October 19: Kishwer Merchant and Roopal Tyagi’s cat fight in episode 8 was super fun!

author: Prathamesh Jadhav | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: Bigg Boss 9 October 19: Kishwer Merchant and Roopal Tyagi’s cat fight in episode 8 was super fun!
text:
Bigg Boss 9 October 19: Kishwer Merchant and Roopal Tyagi’s cat fight in episode 8 was super fun! By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 20, 2015 at 12:47 AM Comments 
Bigg boss 9 continues to dish out drama like no other. The latest commotion made us glued to the small screen as Roopal Ryagi and Kishwer Merchant had a big verbal tussle. We loved the explosion as the two got on each other’s nerve after launching verbal missiles verbal missiles at one another. The drama in the glass-walled house kicked off with Roopla shedding tears for the eviction of Ankit Tyagi. few inmates pacified the damsel in distress and camer forward to offer her their shoulders in Roppla’s hour of need. ALSO READ: Bigg Boss 9: Terms & conditions contestants have agreed to before entering Salman Khan’s show! 
The episode was also marked by the nominations. The regular round of nomination was kicked off with a jodi nominating two others. It was later announced that out of the said jodi, one person will have to sacrifice their safety and get nominated instead for the next round of eliminations. After much debate and discussions these names were thrown around for nominations- Aman Verma, Rimi Sen, Mandana Karimi, Roopal Tyagi and Prince Narula. 
But the real highlight of the show was the ugly fight between Kishwer Merchant and Roopal Tyagi. It so happened that when it dawned on inmates that the prize money now stands at less than Rs 40 lakh, there were major discussions. Kishwer started getting angry and Roopal though that Miss Merchent was getting all nerves and hyper to gain footage. This led to a massive explosion. Merchent did not stop at that she launched another verbal attack and went on to say that she was trying to prove Salman’s point! ( Bhai had called Miss Tyagi the silent one!)
